title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 August 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (25/08/2008 04:30): Main.Test was modified by XWiki.evonli - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Test  
xwikibot - (25/08/2008 08:57): Main.Test was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Test  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:40): jvdrean\_, thomasmortagne, mflorea: I'm ready to commit a first working version of the new configuration component in xwiki core/ based on the email I sent. Is that ok with you? Would be cool if you could answer to the email so that I get more opinions. I'll wait till I get your decisions. Thanks!  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:45): jvdrean\_: as you've probably seen we have quite a few problems with hudson.  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:46): jvdrean\_: there's the JVM issue I think (the same we had with Continuum - We need to ask Raff to change the JDK I think) but there seems to be some false positives too  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:46): I think it doesn't build in the right order when we make modifications to several modules  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:47): also I don't understand what's wrong with build #124 here: http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/XE%20trunk/job/xwiki-platform-core-trunk/  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:47): any idea?  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:47): ah seems to be some svn issue: http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/XE%20trunk/job/xwiki-platform-core-trunk/124/console  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 13:48): do you think you could look into that at some point?  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 13:58): I have that from time to time with my freeswitch hudson  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 13:58): http://www.freeswitch.de/hudson  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 13:59): besides that you should upgrade hudson  
jvdrean - (25/08/2008 14:18): vmassol: I've seen the hudson issues, I'll look at it asap  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 14:18): cypromis: yes we haven't updated for 2 or 3 weeks... that means at least 10 new versions of hudson ;)  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:19): 17 I think  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:19): the SVN issue is pretty enerving  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:19): but common  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 14:21): cypromis: ok so it's a known issue cool.   
vmassol - (25/08/2008 14:21): cypromis: you don't know if it's been fixed do you?  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:21): no, I still have it from time to time  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:22): but only on 2 boxes  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:22): the rest never has it  
cypromis - (25/08/2008 14:22): and those 2 boxes are busy  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 14:28): cypromis: ok  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 14:33): just committed first version of xwiki-configuration

jdolan\_ - (25/08/2008 15:51): mornin'   
asyd - (25/08/2008 15:51): ola  
xwikibot - (25/08/2008 15:52): FAQ.SyntaxhighlightingisnotworkingWhatamIdoingwrong was modified by XWiki.albanschmid (Syntax highlighting is not working properly. What's wrong?) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/SyntaxhighlightingisnotworkingWhatamIdoingwrong  
vmassol - (25/08/2008 16:50): I'll be offline for the coming 3.5 hours. I'll be online after.
